SELECT b.*,f.file_url,f.file_new_name FROM bas_river_head b LEFT JOIN bas_river_head_reach r ON b.RIVER_HEAD_ID = r.RIVER_HEAD_ID LEFT JOIN bas_file_head f ON b.RIVER_HEAD_ID = f.bus_id WHERE r.river_reach_id = '${request.riverReachId}'
AND b.NAME LIKE '%${request.searchName}%'
GROUP BY b.RIVER_HEAD_ID

SELECT s.*,COUNT(b.RIVER_HEAD_ID) cun FROM sys_districts s LEFT JOIN bas_river_head b ON CASE s.RES_LEVEL WHEN '2' THEN LEFT(AREA_CODE,4) = LEFT(RES_ID,4) WHEN '3' THEN LEFT(AREA_CODE,6) = LEFT(RES_ID,6) WHEN '4' THEN LEFT(AREA_CODE,9) = LEFT(RES_ID,9) ELSE AREA_CODE = RES_ID END LEFT JOIN sys_account t ON b.ACCOUNT_ID = t.USER_ACCT_ID WHERE b.HEAD_STATE = '1' AND b.state = '0' AND b.RIVER_LAKE_HEAD LIKE '%${request.riverLakeHead}%' AND t.USER_TYPE = '1' AND t.USER_STATE = '1' -- ${@com.zdww.lzshzz.util.AreaCodeUtil@getAreaCode(request.areaCode)} AND s.RES_PART_ID = '${request.areaCode}'
AND (b.NAME LIKE '%${request.searchName}%' OR b.LOGIN_NAME LIKE '%${request.searchName}%' OR b.LINK_TEL LIKE '%${request.searchName}%')
GROUP BY RES_ID

SELECT h.* FROM bas_river_head h LEFT JOIN sys_account t ON h.ACCOUNT_ID = t.USER_ACCT_ID WHERE h.HEAD_STATE = '1'AND h.state = '0' AND h.RIVER_LAKE_HEAD LIKE '%${request.riverLakeHead}%' AND t.USER_TYPE = '1' AND t.USER_STATE = '1'
AND h.AREA_CODE = '${request.areaCode}'
AND h.AREA_CODE like '${@com.zdww.lzshzz.util.AreaCodeUtil@getAreaCode(request.areaCode)}%'
AND (h.LOGIN_NAME LIKE '%${request.searchName}%' OR h.NAME LIKE '%${request.searchName}%' OR h.LINK_TEL LIKE '%${request.searchName}%')
ORDER BY h.ADMIN_POST_SORT,h.ADMIN_POST,h.area_code
